verbs.description: [V: is] [ARG1: your family physician the new doctor death is your family physician the new doctor] death do you really want to go to a doctor who can kill you and get away with it think just for a teeny - tiny moment what that means or at least what it has come to mean in jurisdictions where euthanasia has been legalized for a few decades what has happened is what always happens people kept on pushing if euthanasia physician murder ama american academy of family physicians family physician argentine medical association dementia
